title: The $15 dream | Today, Explained in 10
description:
Washington’s hottest policy fight is over raising the minimum wage to $15. Emily Stewart explains the Democrats’ effort to get it through Congress.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: The $15 dream | Today, Explained in 10
itunes:author: Vox
itunes:subtitle: Democrats have a few ways to get a $15 minimum wage passed, but the likeliest outcome is that it won't pass at all.
